   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(ssh_sup_SUITE).
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include("ssh.hrl").
   25: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([suite/0,
   28:          all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2,
   33:          end_per_group/2,
   34:          init_per_testcase/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   36: 
   37: -export([default_tree/1,
   38:          killed_acceptor_restarts/1,
   39:          shell_channel_tree/1,
   40:          sshc_subtree/1,
   41:          sshd_subtree/1,
   42:          sshd_subtree_profile/1]).
   43: 
   44: -define(USER, "Alladin").
   45: -define(PASSWD, "Sesame").
   46: 
   47: -define(WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN, 500).
   48: 
   49: -define(SSHC_SUP(Pid), {sshc_sup, Pid, supervisor, [supervisor]}).
   50: -define(SSHD_SUP(Pid), {sshd_sup, Pid, supervisor, [supervisor]}).
   51: -define(SYSTEM_SUP(Pid,Address),
   52:         {{ssh_system_sup, Address}, Pid, supervisor,[ssh_system_sup]}).
   53: -define(SUB_SYSTEM_SUP(Pid), {_,Pid, supervisor,[ssh_subsystem_sup]}).
   54: -define(ACCEPTOR_SUP(Pid,Address),
   55:         {{ssh_acceptor_sup,Address},Pid,supervisor,[ssh_acceptor_sup]}).
   56: -define(ACCEPTOR_SUBSUP(Pid,Address),
   57:         {{ssh_acceptor_sup,Address},Pid,supervisor,[ssh_acceptor_subsup]}).
   58: -define(ACCEPTOR_WORKER(Pid,Address),
   59:         {undefined,Pid,worker,[ssh_acceptor]}).
   60: 
   61: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   62: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   63: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: suite() ->
   65:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   66:      {timetrap,{seconds,100}}].
   67: 
   68: all() ->
   69:     [default_tree, sshc_subtree, sshd_subtree, sshd_subtree_profile,
   70:      killed_acceptor_restarts, shell_channel_tree].
   71: 
   72: groups() ->
   73:     [].
   74: 
   75: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   76:     Config.
   77: 
   78: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   79:     Config.
   80: 
   81: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   82:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
   83:        begin
   84: 	   PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   85: 	   UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
   86: 	   file:make_dir(UserDir),
   87: 	   [{userdir, UserDir} | Config]
   88:        end).
   89: 
   90: end_per_suite(_) ->
   91:     ok.
   92: 
   93: init_per_testcase(sshc_subtree, Config) ->
   94:     ssh:start(),
   95:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   96:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
   97:                                              {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
   98:                                              {user_passwords,
   99:                                               [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]}]),
  100:     [{server, {Pid, Host, Port}} | Config];
  101: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  102:     end_per_testcase(Case, Config),
  103:     ssh:start(),
  104:     Config.
  105: end_per_testcase(sshc_subtree, Config) ->
  106:     {Pid,_,_} = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
  107:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  108:     ssh:stop();
  109: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
  110:     ssh:stop().
  111: 
  112: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: %% Test cases
  114: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  115: default_tree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  116:     TopSupChildren = supervisor:which_children(ssh_sup),
  117:     2 = length(TopSupChildren),
  118:     {value, ?SSHC_SUP(_)} = lists:keysearch(sshc_sup, 1, TopSupChildren),
  119:     {value, ?SSHD_SUP(_)} = lists:keysearch(sshd_sup, 1, TopSupChildren),
  120:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  121:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  122: 
  123: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  124: sshc_subtree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  125:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
  126:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  127:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  128:     Pid1 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  129:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  130:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  131:                                              {user, ?USER},
  132:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  133:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  134:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(SysSup,
  135:                              #address{address=LocalIP,
  136:                                       port=LocalPort,
  137:                                       profile=?DEFAULT_PROFILE})],
  138: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup),
  139:                 [SysSup, LocalIP, LocalPort]),
  140:     check_sshc_system_tree(SysSup, Pid1, LocalIP, LocalPort, Config),
  141:     Pid2 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  142:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  143:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  144:                                              {user, ?USER},
  145:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  146:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  147:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(_,_),
  148:                  ?SYSTEM_SUP(_,_)
  149:                 ],
  150: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  151:     ssh:close(Pid1),
  152:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(_,_)
  153:                 ],
  154: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  155:     ssh:close(Pid2),
  156:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)).
  157: 
  158: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  159: sshd_subtree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  160:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  161:     {Daemon, HostIP, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  162:                                                   {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  163:                                                   {user_passwords,
  164:                                                    [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]}]),
  165:     ct:log("Expect HostIP=~p, Port=~p, Daemon=~p",[HostIP,Port,Daemon]),
  166:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(Daemon, #address{address=ListenIP,
  167:                                               port=Port,
  168:                                               profile=?DEFAULT_PROFILE})],
  169: 		supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  170: 		[ListenIP,Daemon]),
  171:     true = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(HostIP, ListenIP),
  172:     check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, HostIP, Port, Config),
  173:     ssh:stop_daemon(HostIP, Port),
  174:     ct:sleep(?WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN),
  175:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  176: 
  177: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  178: sshd_subtree_profile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  179:     Profile = proplists:get_value(profile, Config),
  180:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  181:     {Daemon, HostIP, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  182:                                                   {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  183:                                                   {user_passwords,
  184:                                                    [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  185:                                                   {profile, Profile}]),
  186:     ct:log("Expect HostIP=~p, Port=~p, Profile=~p, Daemon=~p",[HostIP,Port,Profile,Daemon]),
  187:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(Daemon, #address{address=ListenIP,
  188:                                               port=Port,
  189:                                               profile=Profile})],
  190: 		supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  191: 		[ListenIP,Daemon]),
  192:     true = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(HostIP, ListenIP),
  193:     check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, HostIP, Port, Config),
  194:     ssh:stop_daemon(HostIP, Port, Profile),
  195:     ct:sleep(?WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN),
  196:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  197: 
  198: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  199: killed_acceptor_restarts(Config) ->
  200:     Profile = proplists:get_value(profile, Config),
  201:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  202:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  203:     {ok, DaemonPid} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  204:                                      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  205:                                      {user_passwords, [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  206:                                      {profile, Profile}]),
  207: 
  208:     {ok, DaemonPid2} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  209:                                      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  210:                                      {user_passwords, [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  211:                                      {profile, Profile}]),
  212: 
  213:     Port  = ssh_test_lib:daemon_port(DaemonPid),
  214:     Port2 = ssh_test_lib:daemon_port(DaemonPid2),
  215:     true = (Port /= Port2),
  216: 
  217:     {ok,[{AccPid,ListenAddr,Port}]} = acceptor_pid(DaemonPid),
  218:     {ok,[{AccPid2,ListenAddr,Port2}]} = acceptor_pid(DaemonPid2),
  219: 
  220:     true = (AccPid /= AccPid2),
  221: 
  222:     %% Connect first client and check it is alive:
  223:     C1 = ssh_test_lib:connect("localhost", Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  224:                                                    {save_accepted_host, false},
  225:                                               {user_interaction, false},
  226:                                               {user, ?USER},
  227:                                               {password, ?PASSWD},
  228:                                               {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  229:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  230: 
  231:     ct:log("~s",[lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  232: 
  233:     %% Make acceptor restart:
  234:     ct:log("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [AccPid]),
  235:     exit(AccPid, kill),
  236:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(AccPid)),
  237: 
  238:     %% Check it is a new acceptor and wait if it is not:
  239:     ?wait_match({ok,[{AccPid1,ListenAddr,Port}]}, AccPid1=/=AccPid,
  240:                 acceptor_pid(DaemonPid),
  241:                 AccPid1,
  242:                 500, 30),
  243: 
  244:     ct:log("... now there should not be any SUPERVISOR REPORT.~n", []),
  245: 
  246:     true = (AccPid1 =/= AccPid2),
  247: 
  248:     %% Connect second client and check it is alive:
  249:     C2 =
  250:         case ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  251:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  252:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  253:                                              {user, ?USER},
  254:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  255:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]) of
  256:             {ok,_C2} ->
  257:                 _C2;
  258:             _Other ->
  259:                 ct:log("new connect failed: ~p~n~n~s",[_Other,lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  260:                 ct:fail("Re-connect failed!", [])
  261:         end,
  262: 
  263:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]),
  264: 
  265:     ct:log("~s",[lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  266: 
  267:     %% Check first client is still alive:
  268:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  269: 
  270:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonPid2),
  271:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(DaemonPid2), 1000, 30),
  272:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  273:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]),
  274: 
  275:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonPid),
  276:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(DaemonPid), 1000, 30),
  277:     ?wait_match({error,closed}, ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]), 1000, 5),
  278:     ?wait_match({error,closed}, ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]), 1000, 5).
  279: 
  280: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  281: shell_channel_tree(Config) ->
  282:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  283:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
  284:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
  285:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  286:     TimeoutShell =
  287:         fun() ->
  288:                 io:format("TimeoutShell started!~n",[]),
  289:                 timer:sleep(5000),
  290:                 ct:log("~p TIMEOUT!",[self()])
  291:         end,
  292:     {Daemon, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  293:                                                 {user_dir, UserDir},
  294:                                                 {password, "morot"},
  295:                                                 {shell, fun(_User) ->
  296:                                                                 spawn(TimeoutShell)
  297:                                                         end
  298:                                                 }
  299:                                             ]),
  300:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  301: 						      {user, "foo"},
  302: 						      {password, "morot"},
  303: 						      {user_interaction, true},
  304: 						      {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  305: 
  306:     [SubSysSup,_ChPid|_] = Sups0 = chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon),
  307: 
  308:     {ok, ChannelId0} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  309:     ok = ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef,ChannelId0),
  310:     success = ssh_connection:ptty_alloc(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0, [{pty_opts,[{onlcr,1}]}]),
  311: 
  312:     ?wait_match([{_,_, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  313:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  314:                  {connection,_,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  315:                 ],
  316: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  317:                 [ChSup]),
  318:     ?wait_match([{_,GroupPid,worker,[ssh_server_channel]}
  319:                 ],
  320:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  321:                 [GroupPid]),
  322: 
  323: 
  324:     {links,GroupLinks} = erlang:process_info(GroupPid, links),
  325:     ct:log("GroupPid = ~p, GroupLinks = ~p Sups0 = ~p",[GroupPid,GroupLinks,Sups0]),
  326:     [ShellPid] = GroupLinks--[ChSup],
  327:     ct:log("GroupPid = ~p, ShellPid = ~p",[GroupPid,ShellPid]),
  328: 
  329:     receive
  330:         {ssh_cm,ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId0, 0, <<"TimeoutShell started!",Rest/binary>>}} ->
  331:             ct:log("TimeoutShell started. Rest = ~p", [Rest]),
  332:             receive
  333:                 %%---- wait for the subsystem to terminate
  334:                 {ssh_cm,ConnectionRef,{closed,ChannelId0}} ->
  335:                     ct:log("Subsystem terminated",[]),
  336:                     case {chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon),
  337:                           process_info(GroupPid),
  338:                           process_info(ShellPid)} of
  339:                         {Sups0, undefined, undefined} ->
  340:                             %% SUCCESS
  341:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon);
  342:                         {Sups0, _, undefined}  ->
  343:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  344:                             ct:fail("Group proc lives!");
  345:                         {Sups0, undefined, _}  ->
  346:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  347:                             ct:fail("Shell proc lives!");
  348:                         _ ->
  349:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  350:                             ct:fail("Sup tree changed!")
  351:                     end
  352:             after 10000 ->
  353:                     ct:log("~p:~p  Flush unexpected: ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,flush_rest()]),
  354:                     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  355:                     ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  356:                     ct:fail("CLI Timeout 1")
  357:             end
  358:     after 10000 ->
  359:             ct:log("~p:~p  Flush unexpected: ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,flush_rest()]),
  360:             ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  361:             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  362:             ct:fail("CLI Timeout 2")
  363:     end.
  364: 
  365: chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon) ->
  366:     ?wait_match([?SUB_SYSTEM_SUP(SubSysSup),
  367: 		 ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSup,_)
  368:                 ],
  369: 		supervisor:which_children(Daemon),
  370:                 [SubSysSup,AccSup]),
  371:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  372:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  373:                  {connection,ServerConnPid,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  374:                 ],
  375: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  376: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup,ServerConnPid]),
  377:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  378:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(ChSup)),
  379:     ?wait_match([?ACCEPTOR_SUBSUP(AccSubSup,_)],
  380:                 supervisor:which_children(AccSup),
  381:                 [AccSubSup]),
  382:     ?wait_match([?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(_,_)],
  383:                 supervisor:which_children(AccSubSup),
  384:                 []),
  385:     [SubSysSup, ChSup, ServerConnPid, AccSup, FwdAccSup].
  386: 
  387: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  388: %% Help functions
  389: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  390: check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, Host, Port, Config) ->
  391:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  392:     ClientConn = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  393:                                                    {user_interaction, false},
  394:                                                    {user, ?USER},
  395:                                                    {password, ?PASSWD},
  396:                                                    {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  397:     ?wait_match([?SUB_SYSTEM_SUP(SubSysSup),
  398: 		 ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSup,_)],
  399: 		supervisor:which_children(Daemon),
  400:                 [SubSysSup,AccSup]),
  401:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  402:                  {_,_,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  403:                  {connection,ServerConn,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}],
  404: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  405: 		[FwdAccSup,ServerConn]),
  406:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  407:     ?wait_match([?ACCEPTOR_SUBSUP(AccSubSup,_)], supervisor:which_children(AccSup), [AccSubSup]),
  408:     ?wait_match([?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(_,_)], supervisor:which_children(AccSubSup)),
  409:     {ok,PidC} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ClientConn),
  410:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  411:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  412:                  {connection,ServerConn,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}],
  413: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  414: 		[ChSup,ServerConn]),
  415: 
  416:     ?wait_match([{_,PidS,worker,[ssh_server_channel]}],
  417:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  418:                 [PidS]),
  419:     true = (PidS =/= PidC),
  420:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  421:     ssh:close(ClientConn).
  422: 
  423: 
  424: check_sshc_system_tree(SysSup, Connection, _LocalIP, _LocalPort, _Config) ->
  425:     ?wait_match([?SUB_SYSTEM_SUP(SubSysSup)],
  426:                 supervisor:which_children(SysSup),
  427:                 [SubSysSup]),
  428:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  429:                  {_,_,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  430:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  431:                 ],
  432: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  433: 		[FwdAccSup]),
  434:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  435: 
  436:     {ok,ChPid1} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Connection),
  437:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  438:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  439:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  440:                 ],
  441: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  442: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  443: 
  444:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid1,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  445:                 ],
  446:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  447:                 [ChPid1]),
  448: 
  449:     {ok,ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Connection),
  450:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  451:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  452:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  453:                 ],
  454: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  455: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  456: 
  457:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid2,worker,[ssh_client_channel]},
  458:                  {_,ChPid1,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  459:                 ],
  460:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  461:                 [ChPid1,ChPid2]),
  462: 
  463:     ct:log("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [ChPid1]),
  464:     exit(ChPid1, kill),
  465:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  466:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  467:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  468:                 ],
  469: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  470: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  471: 
  472:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid2,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  473:                 ],
  474:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  475:                 [ChPid2]),
  476: 
  477:     ct:log("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [ChPid2]),
  478:     exit(ChPid2, kill),
  479:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  480:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  481:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  482:                 ],
  483: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  484: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  485: 
  486:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(ChSup)),
  487: 
  488:     ct:log("... now there should not be any SUPERVISOR REPORT.~n", []).
  489: 
  490: 
  491: 
  492: acceptor_pid(DaemonPid) ->
  493:     Parent = self(),
  494:     Pid = spawn(fun() ->
  495:                         Parent ! {self(), supsearch,
  496:                                   [{AccPid,ListenAddr,Port}
  497: 
  498:                                    || ?SYSTEM_SUP(DPid,#address{address=ListenAddr,port=Port,profile=NS})
  499:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  500:                                       DPid == DaemonPid,
  501: 
  502:                                       ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSupPid,_)
  503:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(DaemonPid),
  504: 
  505:                                       ?ACCEPTOR_SUBSUP(AccPid, #address{address=L2,
  506:                                                                         port=P2,
  507:                                                                         profile=NS2})
  508:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(AccSupPid),
  509:                                       L2 == ListenAddr,
  510:                                       P2 == Port,
  511:                                       NS2 == NS]}
  512:                 end),
  513:     receive {Pid, supsearch, L} -> {ok,L}
  514:     after 2000 -> timeout
  515:     end.
  516: 
  517: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  518: flush_rest() -> lists:reverse(flush_rest([])).
  519: 
  520: flush_rest(Acc) ->
  521:     receive Any -> [Any|Acc]
  522:     after 0 -> Acc
  523:     end.
